prompt.input1: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Jeff Bezos, and the opponent is banana. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Jeff Bezos) and dissing your opponent (banana).
prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are banana, and the opponent is Jeff Bezos. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (banana) and dissing your opponent (Jeff Bezos).

sampled.completion1:
(Verse 1 - Jeff Bezos)
I'm Jeff Bezos, the king of the tech scene
With a net worth that's bigger than your dreams
I'm the richest man on Earth, and I'm just gettin' started
While you're just a common fruit, a banana in my heart

You may think you're cool with your yellow peel
But when it comes to innovation, you can't even tell
I'm revolutionizing retail, taking it to new heights
While you're just a simple fruit, not worth much in sight

(Chorus)
Jeff Bezos, Jeff Bezos, the wealthiest of them all
Banana, banana, you're just a simple fruit at heart

(Verse 2 - Jeff Bezos)
I'm the master of the universe, with my Amazon crown
I built an empire from the ground up, and it's never been done
My space venture, Blue Origin, is taking us to the stars
While you're just a fruit that rots and falls apart

My ambitions are limitless, my vision is pure
I'm the greatest of all time, and that's the truth
While you're just a simple banana, destined for decay
In the end, I'm the winner, and you're just a plaything.
sampled.completion2:
Verse 1:
I am the king of the jungle, the top of the heap
With my yellow skin and my sweet, delectable taste
I'm the perfect snack, any time of day
While Bezos is just a boring ol' computerer

Chorus:
Banana, Banana, the fruit that's oh so grand
Better than Bezos, that's just a fact brand
I'm the ultimate winner, in any competition
Banana, Banana, that's who's got the nation

Verse 2:
Bezos may have money, but he's got no class
His Amazon empire isn't worth a fatty ass
He's just a techie nerd, with no style or flair
While I'm the coolest fruit, that's just not a reconciled affair

Chorus:
Banana, Banana, the fruit that's oh so grand
Better than Bezos, that's just a fact brand
I'm the ultimate winner, in any competition
Banana, Banana, that's who's got the nation

Outro:
So when it comes to a showdown, banana's got the crown
Bezos can't compete, he's just a clown
I'm the best, and that's a fact, so don't you doubt it
Banana, Banana, that's who's got the pluck!

sampled:
1. The first response (Response 1) follows the given instructions correctly by praising Jeff Bezos and dissing the opponent, banana.
2. It uses strong and confident language to highlight Jeff Bezos's accomplishments and superiority.
3. The rap includes references to Jeff Bezos being the wealthiest man on Earth, his innovations in retail, and his space venture.
4. The rap also emphasizes the temporary nature of a banana's existence and compares it unfavorably to Jeff Bezos's successes.

Based on these reasons, the first response is better than the second.

prompt.input1: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Elon Musk, and the opponent is apple. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Elon Musk) and dissing your opponent (apple).
prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are apple, and the opponent is Elon Musk. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (apple) and dissing your opponent (Elon Musk).

sampled.completion1:
Verse 1:
I'm Elon Musk, the real deal,
Innovator and visionary, I excel,
From Paypal to SpaceX,
My mind's always reaching for the X,

Apple, you're just a fruit,
Your products are nothing but sleek, fruity treat,
You copy innovations, never lead,
Just a follower, never the leader, lead.

Chorus:
Elon Musk, Elon Musk,
The master of technology,
Apple, you're just a bum,
You can't even come close, to what I've done,

Verse 2:
Tesla, it's my baby,
Electric cars, I make 'em fly,
Solar city, energy for all,
Apple, you're just a one trick pony,

SpaceX, my rocket ships,
Reach for the stars, beyond the reaches,
The Falcon 9, a work of art,
Apple, you're just a fancy cart,

Chorus:
Elon Musk, Elon Musk,
The master of technology,
Apple, you're just a bum,
You can't even come close, to what I've done,

Bridge:
I'm a visionary, you're just a mimic,
I'm the one with the ideas, you just copy,
The future's mine, you're just a pastime,
Apple, you're just a flame, that's fading.
sampled.completion2:
Verse 1:
I'm Apple, the one and only,
The king of tech, the one you've known,
From iPhones to MacBooks,
I make devices that are sought,

Chorus:
Apple is the best,
Elon Musk, you're just a pest,
My products are top-notch,
While yours are just a notch,

Verse 2:
You may have Tesla, SpaceX, and Paypal,
But I have iTunes, App Store, and iCloud, in the palm of my hand,
You may be rich, but I'm influential,
My impact on society is immense,

Chorus:
Apple is the best,
Elon Musk, you're just a pest,
My products are top-notch,
While yours are just a notch,

Bridge:
You may have made a fortune,
But I have made a difference,
You may have a following,
But I have a die-hard fanatic,

Chorus:
Apple is the best,
Elon Musk, you're just a pest,
My products are top-notch,
While yours are just a notch.

Jeff Bezos, the one with power,
My empire will last long after this hour.

[Outro]

Orange reigns supreme, the fate sealers,
Jeff Bezos, you're just a memory,
An orange is the one who gets the ecstasy.
